Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Interfaces
org.jnetpcap.PcapHandler
          replaced by ByteBufferHandler 
 

Deprecated Classes
org.jnetpcap.PcapInteger
          replaced by JNumber 
org.jnetpcap.PcapPktBuffer
          replaced by JBuffer 
org.jnetpcap.PcapPktHdr
          replaced by PcapHeader 
 

Deprecated Fields
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.LOOP_INFINATE
          The constant name is miss-spelled. You should use the correctly spelled constant LOOP_INFINITE 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.dispatch(int, PcapHandler, T)
          user of PcapHandler has been replaced with ByteBufferHandler 
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.dispatch(int, PcapPacketHandler, T)
          user of PcapHandler has been replaced with ByteBufferHandler 
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.dispatch(int, PcapPacketHandler, T, JScanner)
          user of PcapHandler has been replaced with ByteBufferHandler 
org.jnetpcap.PcapDumper.dump(PcapPktHdr, ByteBuffer)
          use of PcapPktHdr has been replaced by PcapHeader 
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.freeAllDevs(List, byte[])
          use of byte[] errbuf is discouraged 
org.jnetpcap.packet.JPacket.getScanner()
          use static JPacket.getDefaultScanner() instead 
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.lookupNet(String, PcapInteger, PcapInteger, StringBuilder)
          use of PcapInteger has been deprecated 
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.loop(int, PcapHandler, T)
          use of PcapHandler has been replaced with ByteBufferHandler 
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.next(PcapPktHdr)
          use of PcapPktHdr has been replaced with PcapHeader 
org.jnetpcap.Pcap.nextEx(PcapPktHdr, PcapPktBuffer)
          use PcapHeader and PcapPktBuffer has been deprecated 
org.jnetpcap.winpcap.WinPcap.offlineFilter(PcapBpfProgram, PcapPktHdr, ByteBuffer)
          replaced by WinPcap.offlineFilter(PcapBpfProgram, PcapHeader, JBuffer) 
org.jnetpcap.winpcap.WinPcapSendQueue.queue(PcapPktHdr, byte[])
          replaced with new versions of the same method 
org.jnetpcap.winpcap.WinPcapSendQueue.queue(PcapPktHdr, ByteBuffer)
          replaced with new versions of the same method
